entry.Ruby: WYNAUT can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this POKéMON will be slapping the ground with its tail.
entry.Sapphire: WYNAUT gather on moonlit nights to play by squeezing up against each other. By being squeezed, this POKéMON gains endurance and is trained to dole out powerful counterattacks.
entry.FireRedLeafGreen: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
entry.Emerald: A WYNAUT loves to eat sweet fruits. It cleverly picks fruits using its earlike arms. They gather in fruit gardens, drawn by the fragrance.
entry.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
entry.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.
entry.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
entry.X: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
entry.Y: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
entry.Omega Ruby: Wynaut can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this Pokémon will be slapping the ground with its tail.
entry.Alpha Sapphire: Wynaut gather on moonlit nights to play by squeezing up against each other. By being squeezed, this Pokémon gains endurance and is trained to dole out powerful counterattacks.
